languages.text: Когда служба Леди-Навигатора подошла к концу, Кассия покинула Вольного Торговца и вернулась в лоно Дома. Поползли слухи, что вскоре трон Орселлио займет новый Новатор, и Дом воспрянет после долгих лет сдержанной тишины. Однако инаугурации не было суждено свершиться — распри внутри Дома вспыхнули с новой силой, превратившись в братоубийственную войну. Леди Кассия погибла в самом ее начале, забрав с собой тысячи жизней верноподданных и ренегатов. Иные навигаторские Дома приложили усилия, дабы развеять останки некогда великого Дома Орселлио и поглотить то немногое, что от него осталось.

When the Lady Navigator's service came to an end, Cassia left the Rogue Trader and returned to House Orsellio's embrace. It was rumoured that a new Novator would soon take the throne and the House would be reborn after years of silence. Alas, the inauguration did not come to pass, as the discord within the House flared up and turned into a fratricidal war. Lady Cassia died at its outset, taking the lives of many loyalists and renegades with her. The other Navigator Houses made efforts to scatter the remains of the once great House Orsellio and to absorb what little was left of it.

Иные навигаторские Дома приложили усилия, дабы развеять останки некогда великого Дома Орселлио и поглотить то немногое, что от него осталось.

The other Navigator Houses made efforts to scatter the remains of the once great House Orsellio and to absorb what little remained of it.

languages.text: 导航者女士在船上的工作结束之后，便离开了行商浪人，回到了奥赛罗家族的怀抱。所有人都说，一位新的大族长将会登上王位，而她的家族也会在沉寂多年之后再度重生。但遗憾的是，卡西娅没能成为家族的大族长，因为家族之间爆发了冲突，最终演变成一场自相残杀的战争。战争爆发不久，卡西娅女士就遭到了杀害，无数忠诚份子与叛徒也在这场内乱中身亡。其余的导航者家族趁机瓜分曾一度伟大的奥赛罗家族剩余的遗产，将残存的一切据为己用。
languages.original_text: When the Lady Navigator's service came to an end, Cassia left the Rogue Trader and returned to House Orsellio's embrace. It was rumoured that a new Novator would soon take the throne and the House would be reborn after years of silence. Alas, the inauguration did not come to pass, as the discord within the House flared up and turned into a fratricidal war. Lady Cassia died at its outset, taking the lives of many loyalists and renegades with her. The other Navigator Houses made efforts to scatter the remains of the once great House Orsellio and to absorb what little was left of it.

traits.locale_text: 导航者女士在船上的工作结束之后，便离开了行商浪人，回到了奥塞罗家族的怀抱。所有人都说，一位新的大族长将会登上王位，而她的家族也会在沉寂多年之后再度重生。但遗憾的是，卡西娅没能成为家族的大族长，因为家族之间爆发了冲突，最终演变成一场自相残杀的战争。战争爆发不久，卡西娅女士就遭到了杀害，无数忠诚份子与叛徒也在这场内乱中身亡。其余的导航者家族趁机瓜分曾一度伟大的奥塞罗家族剩余的遗产，将残存的一切据为己用。

languages.text: 航宙士としての職務が終わった時、カシアは自由開拓者の元を去り、オーセリオ家へと戻った。噂では新たなノベイターが王座に就き、オーセリオ家は長年の沈黙を破って生まれ変わるだろうと言われていた。哀しいかな、その就任は実現しなかった。一族内の不和が勃発し、兄弟間の争いへと発展したのだ。レディ・カシアはその開幕と同時に命を落としたが、多くの忠臣と背教者の命も奪っていった。他の航宙士の家はかつて偉大だったオーセリオ家の残骸を蹴散らすこと、少くはあったが残されていたものを吸収することに注力した。
languages.original_text: When the Lady Navigator's service came to an end, Cassia left the Rogue Trader and returned to House Orsellio's embrace. It was rumoured that a new Novator would soon take the throne and the House would be reborn after years of silence. Alas, the inauguration did not come to pass, as the discord within the House flared up and turned into a fratricidal war. Lady Cassia died at its outset, taking the lives of many loyalists and renegades with her. The other Navigator Houses made efforts to scatter the remains of the once great House Orsellio and to absorb what little was left of it.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士としての職務が終わった時、カシアは自由開拓者の元を去り、オーセリオ家へと戻った。噂では新たなノベイターが王座に就き、オーセリオ家は長年の沈黙を破って生まれ変わるだろうと言われていた。哀しいかな、その就任は実現しなかった。一族内の不和が勃発し、兄弟間の争いへと発展したのだ。レディ・カシアはその開幕と同時に命を落としたが、多くの忠臣と背教者の命も奪っていった。他の航宙士の家はかつて偉大だったオーセリオ家の残骸を蹴散らすこと、少くはあったが残されていたものを吸収することに注力した。

languages.text: Lorsque sa période de service arriva à son terme, la navigatrice Cassia quitta {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour retourner au sein de la maison Orsellio. Le bruit courait qu'un nouveau Novator monterait bientôt sur le trône et que la maison renaîtrait après des années de silence. Hélas, l'intronisation n'eut pas lieu, car la discorde qui régnait dans la maison s'intensifia pour donner lieu à une guerre fratricide. Dame Cassia périt dès le début, emportant dans la tombe bon nombre de loyalistes et de renégats. Les autres maisons de navigateurs s'efforcèrent de balayer ou d'absorber ce qu'il restait de la célèbre maison Orsellio.
languages.original_text: When the Lady Navigator's service came to an end, Cassia left the Rogue Trader and returned to House Orsellio's embrace. It was rumoured that a new Novator would soon take the throne and the House would be reborn after years of silence. Alas, the inauguration did not come to pass, as the discord within the House flared up and turned into a fratricidal war. Lady Cassia died at its outset, taking the lives of many loyalists and renegades with her. The other Navigator Houses made efforts to scatter the remains of the once great House Orsellio and to absorb what little was left of it.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque sa période de service arriva à son terme, la navigatrice Cassia quitta {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour retourner au sein de la maison Orsellio. Le bruit courait qu'un nouveau Novator monterait bientôt sur le trône et que la maison renaîtrait après des années de silence. Hélas, l'intronisation n'eut pas lieu, car la discorde qui régnait dans la maison s'intensifia pour donner lieu à une guerre fratricide. Dame Cassia périt dès le début, emportant dans la tombe bon nombre de loyalistes et de renégats. Les autres maisons de navigateurs s'efforcèrent de balayer ou d'absorber ce qu'il restait de la célèbre maison Orsellio.

languages.text: Cuando el servicio de la lady Navegante concluyó, Cassia dejó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para volver al calor de la casa Orsellio. Se rumoreaba que una nueva Novator pronto tomaría el trono y que la casa renacería tras años de silencio. Tristemente, la inauguración no llegó a celebrarse, ya que la discordia entre las ramas de la familia se intensificó hasta causar una guerra fratricida. Lady Cassia murió al comienzo del conflicto, llevándose con ella las vidas de muchos fieles y renegados. Las otras casas de Navegantes se aseguraron de diseminar los restos de la que había sido la gran casa Orsellio y de absorber lo poco que quedaba de ella.
languages.original_text: When the Lady Navigator's service came to an end, Cassia left the Rogue Trader and returned to House Orsellio's embrace. It was rumoured that a new Novator would soon take the throne and the House would be reborn after years of silence. Alas, the inauguration did not come to pass, as the discord within the House flared up and turned into a fratricidal war. Lady Cassia died at its outset, taking the lives of many loyalists and renegades with her. The other Navigator Houses made efforts to scatter the remains of the once great House Orsellio and to absorb what little was left of it.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el servicio de la lady Navegante concluyó, Cassia dejó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para volver al calor de la casa Orsellio. Se rumoreaba que una nueva Novator pronto tomaría el trono y que la casa renacería tras años de silencio. Tristemente, la inauguración no llegó a celebrarse, ya que la discordia entre las ramas de la familia se intensificó hasta causar una guerra fratricida. Lady Cassia murió al comienzo del conflicto, llevándose con ella las vidas de muchos fieles y renegados. Las otras casas de Navegantes se aseguraron de diseminar los restos de la que había sido la gran casa Orsellio y de absorber lo poco que quedaba de ella.

languages.text: Als die Dienstzeit des Lady Navigator endete, verließ Cassia {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und kehrte ins Haus Orsellio zurück. Angeblich sollte schon bald eine neue Novatorin den Thron besteigen und das Haus nach Jahren des Schweigens eine Wiedergeburt erleben. Leider kam es dazu nicht, weil der Zwist innerhalb des Hauses erneut aufflammte und zu einem Bruderkrieg eskalierte. Lady Cassia starb dabei schon früh und riss viele Loyalisten und Abtrünnige mit in den Tod. Die anderen Navigatorenhäuser versuchten, die Überreste des einst großen Hauses Orsellio zu verstreuen bzw. zu absorbieren.
languages.original_text: When the Lady Navigator's service came to an end, Cassia left the Rogue Trader and returned to House Orsellio's embrace. It was rumoured that a new Novator would soon take the throne and the House would be reborn after years of silence. Alas, the inauguration did not come to pass, as the discord within the House flared up and turned into a fratricidal war. Lady Cassia died at its outset, taking the lives of many loyalists and renegades with her. The other Navigator Houses made efforts to scatter the remains of the once great House Orsellio and to absorb what little was left of it.

traits.locale_text: Als die Dienstzeit des Lady Navigator endete, verließ Cassia {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und kehrte ins Haus Orsellio zurück. Angeblich sollte schon bald eine neue Novatorin den Thron besteigen und das Haus nach Jahren des Schweigens eine Wiedergeburt erleben. Leider kam es dazu nicht, weil der Zwist innerhalb des Hauses erneut aufflammte und zu einem Bruderkrieg eskalierte. Lady Cassia starb dabei schon früh und riss viele Loyalisten und Abtrünnige mit in den Tod. Die anderen Navigatorenhäuser versuchten, die Überreste des einst großen Hauses Orsellio zu verstreuen bzw. zu absorbieren.

languages.text: Leydi Rotacı Cassia, hizmetinin son bulmasıyla Hür Tacir'in yanından ayrılarak Orsellio Hanesi'ne geri döndü. Yeni bir Rota Reisi'nin tahta geçeceği ve Hane'nin yıllar süren sessizliğin ardından yeniden doğacağı söyleniyordu. Ancak Hane içi anlaşmazlıklar hararetlenip kanlı bir savaşa dönüştüğünden tahta çıkma töreni gerçekleşemedi. Savaşın daha başında ölen Leydi Cassia, yakınındaki birçok yandaşını ve muhalifi de yanında götürdü. Diğer Rotacı Haneleri, bir zamanların görkemli Orsellio Hanesi'nin kalıntılarını dağıtıp geriye kalan mensupları da bünyelerine kattı.
languages.original_text: When the Lady Navigator's service came to an end, Cassia left the Rogue Trader and returned to House Orsellio's embrace. It was rumoured that a new Novator would soon take the throne and the House would be reborn after years of silence. Alas, the inauguration did not come to pass, as the discord within the House flared up and turned into a fratricidal war. Lady Cassia died at its outset, taking the lives of many loyalists and renegades with her. The other Navigator Houses made efforts to scatter the remains of the once great House Orsellio and to absorb what little was left of it.

traits.locale_text: Leydi Rotacı Cassia, hizmetlerinin son bulmasının ardından Hür Tacir'in yanından ayrılarak Orsellio Hanesi'nin kucağına geri döndü. Yeni bir Rota Reisi'nin tahta geçeceği ve Hane'nin yıllar süren sessizliğin ardından yeniden doğacağı söyleniyordu. Ancak Hane içi anlaşmazlıklar hararetlenip kanlı bir savaşa dönüştüğü için, tahta çıkma töreni gerçekleşemedi. Leydi Cassia, yakınlarındaki birçok yandaşını ve muhalifi de yanında götürerek, savaşın ilk aşamalarında hayatını kaybetti. Diğer Rotacı Haneleri, bir zamanların görkemli Orsellio Hanesi'nin kalıntılarının dağılmasını hızlandırdılar ve geriye kalanları da bünyelerine kattılar.
